name: Statistical Dashboard System
description: A Streamlit-based data science hub for analyzing warehouse, financial, and economic data with native synchronization to the Antigravity Memory Graph.
bridge_logic: Direct injection into Plane PMS via native ORM scripts (manager.py).

sync_pattern.description: Synchronization of analysis results to global memory graph

best_practices: Always sync datasets to Memory for global agent awareness.
Use HTML formatting for Plane reports to ensure professional layout.
Verify database connectivity (dashboards.db) before deep analysis.
anti_patterns: Hardcoding project IDs in synchronization logic.
Directly modifying the SQLite database without using the app layer.
Failing to validate data schemas before ingestion.
